name: Buff Studio Bundle
description:
Buff Studio Bundle includes:
Blue Wednesday

BLUE WEDNESDAY is a narrative adventure game about jazz and love, and about failure. Explore Evans City, chat with various people, and enjoy unique mini-games that connect naturally.

7Days Origins

Every choice you make will change your story. Every small choice will change your relationships with comrades, and change your fate and those of your comrades at critical moments. You may be the villain, or a trustworthy comrade. Everything depends on your choices.

Languages, features and system requirements may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
